description: This source file defines the RecommendedMenuItemAdapter class, which is a RecyclerView adapter used to display a list of recommended menu items in a food delivery Android application. It handles creating view holders, binding menu item data to views, and handling click events.

classes.name: RecommendedMenuItemAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView ListAdapter for displaying recommended menu items, utilizing DiffUtil for efficient updates.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for RecommendedMenuItemAdapter, holding references to item views.
